data.title: Actors Born on November 8
data.meta_description: Famous birthdays in film and TV for the 8th of November. Browse actors, actresses and directors that were born on November 8.
data.text:
King Baggot, American actor and director (Tumbleweeds), born in St Louis, Missouri (d. 1948)

Ethel Clayton, American actress (Hotel Continental), born in Champaign, Illinois (d. 1966)

John Miljan, American actor (The Ten Commandments, Possessed, Final Extra, Susan Lenox), born in Lead City, South Dakota (d. 1960)

Marie Prevost, Canadian actress (The Marriage Circle, The Racket), born in Sarnia, Ontario, Canada (d. 1937)

June Havoc [Ellen Evangeline Hovick], Canadian-born American stage and screen actress, born in Vancouver, British Columbia (d. 2010)

Robert Strauss, American actor (Stalag 17, The Seven Year Itch), born in New York City (d. 1975)

Norman Lloyd, American actor (St. Elsewhere - "Dr. Auschlander"; Dead Poets Society), producer and director (Alfred Hitchcock Presents), born in Jersey City, New Jersey (d. 2021)

Esther Rolle, Bahamian-American actress (Good Times, Maude), born in Pompano Beach Florida (d. 1998)

Gene Saks, American actor and director (One & Only, Prisoner of 2nd Ave), born in New York City (d. 2015)

Joe Flynn, American character actor (McHale's Navy - "Capt. Binghamton; The Love Bug; The Rescuers), born in Youngstown, Ohio (d. 1974)

Ken Dodd, British singer and comedian described as "the last great music hall entertainer", born in Knotty Ash, Liverpool, England (d. 2018)

Darla Hood, American child actress (Little Rascals, The Bat), born in Leedey, Oklahoma (d. 1979)

1931 Morley Safer, Canadian-American TV newscaster (60 Minutes), born in Toronto, Ontario (d. 2016)

Stephane Audran, French actress (Just Before Nightfall), born in Versailles, France (d. 2018)

Alain Delon

French-Swiss stage and screen actor (Purple Noon; Le Samouraï; Monsieur Klein), filmmaker, and pop singer, born in Sceaux, France

Virna Lisi, Italian actress (Assault on a Queen, Bluebeard), born in Ancona, Italy (d. 2014)

Pleuni Touw, Dutch actress (Bride Flight, Dokter Deen), born in Rotterdam, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands

Nerys Hughes, Welsh actress (The Liver Birds; The District Nurse), born in Rhyl, Flintshire, Wales

Mary Hart, American TV hostess (Entertainment Tonight), born in Sioux Falls, South Dakota

Alfre Woodard

American actress (Primal Fear, Cross Creek), born in Tulsa, Oklahoma

1952 Jerry Remy, American baseball infielder (MLB All Star 1978; California Angels, Boston Red Sox) and broadcaster (NESN), born in Fall River, Massachusetts (d. 2021)

David Bret, British biographer and broadcaster, born in Paris

Randi Brooks, American actress (Man With 2 Brains, Tightrope), born in New York City

1956 Richard Curtis, British screenwriter (Blackadder, Four Wedding and a Funeral), born in Wellington, New Zealand

Chi Chi LaRue [Larry David Paciotti], American gay alternative film director and drag queen, born in Hibbing, Minnesota

Michael Nyqvist, Swedish actor (Girl with A Dragon Tattoo), born in Stockholm, Sweden

1960 Oleg Menshikov, Russian actor (Burnt by the Sun), born in Serpukhov, Moscow Oblast, Russian SFSR

Leif Garrett, American singer and actor (Devil x 5, 3 for the Road), born in Hollywood, California

Craig Chester, American actor and screenwriter, born in West Covina, California

Gordon Ramsay

British chef and reality television personality, born in Johnstone, Scotland

Courtney Thorne-Smith, American actress (Melrose Place, Two and a Half Men), born in San Francisco, California

Keith Jones, Canadian NHL right wing, 1992-2000 (Washington Capitals, Philadelphia Flyers, and 1 other team), broadcaster. 2005-23 (NBC, Philadelphia Flyers), and team executive, 2023-present (Philadelphia), born in Brantford, Ontario

1968 Parker Posey, American actress (Tess Shelby-As the World Turns), born in Baltimore, Maryland

1968 Zara Whites, Dutch actress, born in Hoeksche Waard, Netherlands

Roxana Zal, American actress, born in Malibu, California

Carlos Atanes, Spanish film director, born in Barcelona, Spain

Gretchen Mol, American actress, born in Deep River, Connecticut

David Muir

American journalist (ABC news anchor, 20/20), born in Syracuse, New York

1973 Vanesa Littlecrow, Puerto Rican cartoonist, dancer, writer and model, born in Rio Piedras, Puerto Rico

Tara Reid, American actress (Sharknado), born in Wyckoff, New Jersey

Dania Ramírez, Dominican-American television and film actress, born in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic

Joe Cole, English soccer midfielder (56 caps; West Ham United, Chelsea, Liverpool) and broadcaster (TNT Sports), born in London, England

Sam Sparro [Falson], Australian producer, singer, songwriter (Boombox Eternal), and former child actor, born in Sydney

Kat Shoob, British television presenter, born in Rochford, United Kingdom

Jack Osbourne, English television star, born in St John's Wood, London

Erica Mena, American TV personality (Love & Hip Hop: New York), born in New York City

1987 Samantha Droke, American actress, born in De Leon, Texas

Can Yaman, Turkish actor (Erkenci Kuş), born in Istanbul, Turkey

DanTDM [Daniel Middleton], British professional gamer and YouTube personality (The Diamond Minecraft), born in Aldershot, England

Lauren Alaina, American singer-songwriter (American Idol), born in Rossville, Georgia
